about.title: About me
about.string1: I am a developer from Colombia who is interested in web technologies, especially backend development. I was graduated of Academlo Bootcamp as a Full Stack Developer and the University (UTP) in the MisionTic 2022 government program.
about.string2: I develop my skills as an autodidact in online platforms such as Udemy, Official Documentation, Stack OverFlow and ChatGPT. I participated in the No Country program developing the backend of the Fashion Hunter application, I worked for eight months for the company BRM as a full stack developer and another four months for the company Inclub Marketing as a full stack developer.

contact.title: Contact
contact.msj-wsp: Hello! I want to work with you, I saw your portfolio and I liked it.
